entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS AROUND 70

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
